pages.choose: TalentHub India: Premier Recruitment Agency in India | Why choose us Home Who we are Why choose us Why Choose TalentHub India? Choosing the right recruitment agency is crucial for both job seekers and employers. At TalentHub India, we offer a comprehensive range of services tailored to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. Industry Expertise With years of experience in the Indian job market, we have developed a deep understanding of industry trends, challenges, and opportunities. Our expertise allows us to provide valuable insights and guidance to both candidates and employers. Personalized Approach We believe in treating every individual and organization as unique entities with distinct requirements. Our personalized approach ensures that we fully understand your goals and preferences, enabling us to deliver customized solutions that yield optimal results. Extensive Network Our extensive network of top-tier candidates and leading companies enables us to facilitate meaningful connections and create mutually beneficial partnerships. Whether you're looking for top talent or exceptional career opportunities, we've got you covered. 1500+ Happy Placements 200+ Satisfied Clients 98% Client Satisfaction Rate 500+ Successful Projects Useful and Helpful Question & Answers What services does TalentHub India offer? TalentHub India offers a wide range of services including recruitment, resume writing, interview coaching, job search assistance, LinkedIn profile optimization, career counseling, and internship placement. How does TalentHub India select candidates? TalentHub India employs a rigorous selection process that includes screening resumes, conducting interviews, assessing skills and qualifications, and verifying references. We ensure that candidates meet the specific requirements of our clients and possess the necessary expertise for the job. What industries does TalentHub India specialize in? TalentHub India specializes in various industries including IT & Technology, Human Resources, Construction & Engineering, Healthcare & Medicine, Finance & Accounting, and many more. We cater to diverse sectors to provide comprehensive recruitment solutions. How can I contact TalentHub India? You can contact TalentHub India by filling out the contact form on our website, emailing us at info@talenthubindia.com, or calling our office at +91-XXX-XXXXXXX. Our team will be happy to assist you with any inquiries or concerns. Does TalentHub India provide support after placement? Yes, TalentHub India provides ongoing support to both candidates and clients after placement. We ensure smooth onboarding processes, offer guidance during the probation period, and address any issues or concerns that may arise during employment. What makes TalentHub India different from other recruitment agencies? TalentHub India stands out due to its personalized approach, industry expertise, extensive network, and commitment to client satisfaction. We prioritize quality over quantity and strive to build long-term relationships based on trust and mutual success. Can TalentHub India assist with international placements? Yes, TalentHub India has experience in facilitating international placements. Whether you're a candidate seeking opportunities abroad or a company looking to hire international talent, we can provide support and guidance throughout the process. Is TalentHub India's recruitment process confidential? Yes, TalentHub India values confidentiality and respects the privacy of both candidates and clients. Our recruitment process is conducted with the utmost discretion, and sensitive information is handled securely to maintain confidentiality at all times. How long does it take for TalentHub India to fill a job position? The time taken to fill a job position may vary depending on various factors including the complexity of the role, the availability of suitable candidates, and the specific requirements of the client. However, TalentHub India strives to expedite the process while ensuring quality placements. Does TalentHub India offer resume writing services? Yes, TalentHub India provides professional resume writing services to help candidates stand out in the competitive job market. Our expert writers craft tailored resumes that highlight skills, accomplishments, and experiences to attract the attention of employers. What types of companies does TalentHub India work with? TalentHub India works with companies of all sizes across various sectors including startups, SMEs, multinational corporations, and government organizations. We have experience in catering to diverse industries and can adapt our services to meet the unique needs of different companies. Is there a fee for using TalentHub India's services? Yes, TalentHub India may charge a fee for its services depending on the nature of the engagement. Fees may vary based on factors such as the type of service provided, the complexity of the recruitment process, and the level of support required. Please contact us for more information on our fee structure. Can TalentHub India help with career counseling? Yes, TalentHub India offers career counseling services to assist individuals in navigating their career paths effectively. Our experienced counselors provide personalized guidance, assessments, and resources to help clients make informed decisions and achieve their career goals. Does TalentHub India provide internship placement assistance? Yes, TalentHub India helps individuals secure valuable internship opportunities by providing guidance, support, and connections. Whether you're a student looking to gain practical experience or a professional seeking career transition, we can assist you in finding the right internship opportunity. Unlock Your Potential with TalentHub India Discover exciting career opportunities and top talent solutions tailored to your needs. Get Started Home Who we are Why choose us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions 11, Block A, Sector 67, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301, India +91 75 5722 2333 talenthubindia@gmail.com

pages.privacy: TalentHub India: Premier Recruitment Agency in India | privacy policy Home Who we are Why choose us Privacy Policy This privacy policy ("Policy") describes how TalentHub India ("we", "us" or "our") collects, protects and uses the personally identifiable information ("Personal Information") you ("User", "you" or "your") may provide on the TalentHub India website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services"). It also describes the choices available to you regarding our use of your Personal Information and how you can access and update this information. Information We Collect We receive, collect and store any information you enter on our website or provide us in any other way. In addition, we collect the Internet protocol (IP) address used to connect your computer to the Internet; login; e-mail address; password; computer and connection information and purchase history. We may use software tools to measure and collect session information, including page response times, length of visits to certain pages, page interaction information, and methods used to browse away from the page. How We Collect Information When you conduct a transaction on our website, as part of the process, we collect personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address. Your personal information will be used for the specific reasons stated above only. Why We Collect Such Information We collect such Non-personal and Personal Information for the following purposes: To provide and operate the Services; To provide our Users with ongoing customer assistance and technical support; To be able to contact our Visitors and Users with general or personalized service-related notices and promotional messages; To create aggregated statistical data and other aggregated and/or inferred Non-personal Information, which we or our business partners may use to provide and improve our respective services; To comply with any applicable laws and regulations. How We Store, Use, Share and Disclose Our Site Visitors' Personal Information Our company is hosted on the Wix.com platform. Wix.com provides us with the online platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you. Your data may be stored through Wix.com's data storage, databases and the general Wix.com applications. They store your data on secure servers behind a firewall. How We Communicate With Our Site Visitors We may contact you to notify you regarding your account, to troubleshoot problems with your account, to resolve a dispute, to collect fees or monies owed, to poll your opinions through surveys or questionnaires, to send updates about our company, or as otherwise necessary to contact you to enforce our User Agreement, applicable national laws, and any agreement we may have with you. For these purposes we may contact you via email, telephone, text messages, and postal mail. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and we hold certain information. How Can Site Visitors Withdraw Their Consent If you don’t want us to process your data anymore, please contact us at talenthubindia@gmail.com. Privacy Policy Updates We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time, so please review it frequently. Changes and clarifications will take effect immediately upon their posting on the website. If we make material changes to this policy, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it, and under what circumstances, if any, we use and/or disclose it. Contact Information If you would like to: access, correct, amend or delete any personal information we have about you, you are invited to contact us at talenthubindia@gmail.com. Home Who we are Why choose us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions 11, Block A, Sector 67, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301, India +91 75 5722 2333 talenthubindia@gmail.com
pages.terms: TalentHub India: Premier Recruitment Agency in India | terms and conditions Home Who we are Why choose us Terms and Conditions These terms and conditions ("Terms", "Agreement") are an agreement between TalentHub India ("TalentHub India", "us", "we" or "our") and you ("User", "you" or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the TalentHub India website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services"). Accounts and Membership If you create an account on the Website, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and you are fully responsible for all activities that occur under the account and any other actions taken in connection with it. We may, but have no obligation to, monitor and review new accounts before you may sign in and start using our Services. Providing false contact information of any kind may result in the termination of your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized uses of your account or any other breaches of security. Intellectual Property Rights This Agreement does not transfer to you any intellectual property owned by TalentHub India or third-parties, and all rights, titles, and interests in and to such property will remain (as between the parties) solely with TalentHub India. All trademarks, service marks, graphics and logos used in connection with our Website or Services, are trademarks or registered trademarks of TalentHub India or TalentHub India licensors. Other trademarks, service marks, graphics and logos used in connection with our Website or Services may be the trademarks of other third-parties. Your use of our Website and Services grants you no right or license to reproduce or otherwise use any TalentHub India or third-party trademarks. Limitation of Liability To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no event will TalentHub India, even if TalentHub India has been advised as to the possibility of such damages or could have foreseen such damages. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the aggregate liability of TalentHub India and its affiliates, officers, employees, agents, suppliers and licensors, relating to the services will be limited to an amount greater of one dollar or any amounts actually paid in cash by you to TalentHub India for the prior one month period prior to the first event or occurrence giving rise to such liability. The limitations and exclusions also apply if this remedy does not fully compensate you for any losses or fails of its essential purpose. Changes and Amendments We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its policies relating to the Website or Services at any time, effective upon posting of an updated version of this Agreement on the Website. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. Continued use of the Website after any such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes. Acceptance of These Terms You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By using the Website or its Services you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to use or access the Website and its Services. Contacting Us If you would like to contact us to understand more about this Agreement or wish to contact us concerning any matter relating to it, you may send an email to talenthubindia@gmail.com. Home Who we are Why choose us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions 11, Block A, Sector 67, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301, India +91 75 5722 2333 talenthubindia@gmail.com

pages.who: TalentHub India: Premier Recruitment Agency in India | Who we are Home Who we are Why choose us Who We Are Our Mission At TalentHub India, our mission is to connect exceptional talent with rewarding opportunities, facilitating growth and success for both individuals and businesses. Our Values Integrity, excellence, and collaboration are the cornerstones of our operation. We prioritize transparency, professionalism, and dedication in every interaction. Our Approach We take a personalized approach to recruitment, understanding the unique needs of both our clients and candidates. Our team of experts leverages industry insights and cutting-edge technology to ensure optimal matches and long-term success. Why Choose TalentHub India? With a deep understanding of the Indian job market and extensive experience in talent acquisition, we are committed to delivering exceptional results. Whether you're a job seeker looking for your next career move or a company seeking top talent, TalentHub India is your trusted partner. Meet Our Team Our team comprises seasoned professionals with diverse backgrounds and expertise, united by a passion for connecting talent with opportunity. We are dedicated to providing unparalleled service and support throughout your journey with us. How We Work 01 Discover We start by thoroughly understanding the requirements of our clients and the career aspirations of our candidates. This involves conducting in-depth interviews and assessments to ensure precise matching. 02 Connect Once we identify potential matches, we facilitate introductions between candidates and employers, ensuring smooth communication and collaboration throughout the hiring process. 03 Grow Our involvement doesn't stop at placement. We continue to provide support and guidance to both parties, fostering long-term relationships and facilitating growth and success. What Our Customers Say About Us Rajesh Kumar "TalentHub India exceeded my expectations in finding the perfect job match for me. Their personalized approach and attention to detail truly set them apart." Priya Sharma "I highly recommend TalentHub India for their professionalism and dedication. They guided me through every step of the recruitment process and helped me secure a position that aligns perfectly with my career goals." Arun Singh "TalentHub India's team went above and beyond to understand our company's needs and provided us with top-notch candidates. Their expertise and commitment to excellence are commendable." Neha Gupta "I am extremely grateful to TalentHub India for their invaluable assistance in navigating the job market. Their guidance and support were instrumental in helping me land my dream job." Vikram Patel "TalentHub India truly understands the dynamics of the Indian job market. Their strategic approach and industry knowledge make them the go-to recruitment agency for both employers and job seekers." Sunita Sharma "Working with TalentHub India was a game-changer for me. Their professionalism, efficiency, and dedication made the entire job search process a breeze. I couldn't be happier with the results."
